item.title: Tokyo Rocks festival cancelled

item.title: Freddie Mercury sneaked cross-dressing Princess Diana into London gay club
item.description: The late Queen singer smuggled the royal in to the Vauxhall Tavern by dressing her as a man

item.title: US producer Phil Ramone dies aged 79
item.description: Bob Dylan, Billy Joel, Paul Simon and Frank Sinatra were among his production credits
